activities: Our customers are businesses; however, during the course of providing our services and conducting our business we may receive certain personal data about individuals who are residents of the EEA and Switzerland, including customers, vendors, resellers, partners and clients.  As part of Virtustream’s cloud platform and other services, Virtustream may receive host, store and process electronic information from or on behalf of its customers, which includes Personal Data.  In this context, Virtustream acts as a data processor; as such, Virtustream will only process such Personal Data on behalf of and under the instruction of its customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line; Off-line; Manually Processed, Client and Customer Data.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
